com.zwy.kutils.eventbus

类 EventBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zwy.kutils.eventbus.EventBus

  • public class EventBus
extends Object
    EventBus is a central publish/subscribe event system for Android. Events are posted (post(Object)) to the bus, which delivers it to subscribers that have a matching handler method for the event type. To receive events, subscribers must register themselves to the bus using register(Object). Once registered, subscribers receive events until unregister(Object) is called. Event handling methods must be annotated by Subscribe, must be public, return nothing (void), and have exactly one parameter (the event).
    作者:
    Markus Junginger, greenrobot

    • 字段详细资料

      • TAG

        public static String TAG
        Log tag, apps may override it.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • EventBus

        public EventBus()
        Creates a new EventBus instance; each instance is a separate scope in which events are delivered. To use a central bus, consider getDefault().

    • 方法详细资料

      • getDefault

        public static EventBus getDefault()
        双层单例模式
        返回:

      • builder

        public static EventBusBuilder builder()

      • clearCaches

        public static void clearCaches()
        For unit test primarily.

      • register

        public void register(Object subscriber)
        Registers the given subscriber to receive events. Subscribers must call unregister(Object) once they are no longer interested in receiving events.

        Subscribers have event handling methods that must be annotated by Subscribe. The Subscribe annotation also allows configuration like ThreadMode and priority.

      • isRegistered

        public boolean isRegistered(Object subscriber)

      • unregister

        public void unregister(Object subscriber)
        Unregisters the given subscriber from all event classes.

      • post

        public void post(Object event)
        Posts the given event to the event bus.

      • post

        public void post(Object event,
                 String tag)

      • cancelEventDelivery

        public void cancelEventDelivery(Object event)
        Called from a subscriber's event handling method, further event delivery will be canceled. Subsequent subscribers won't receive the event. Events are usually canceled by higher priority subscribers (see Subscribe.priority()). Canceling is restricted to event handling methods running in posting thread ThreadMode.POSTING.

      • postSticky

        public void postSticky(Object event)
        Posts the given event to the event bus and holds on to the event (because it is sticky). The most recent sticky event of an event's type is kept in memory for future access by subscribers using Subscribe.sticky().

      • getStickyEvent

        public <T> T getStickyEvent(Class<T> eventType)
        Gets the most recent sticky event for the given type.

      • removeStickyEvent

        public <T> T removeStickyEvent(Class<T> eventType)
        Remove and gets the recent sticky event for the given event type.

      • removeStickyEvent

        public boolean removeStickyEvent(Object event)
        Removes the sticky event if it equals to the given event.
        返回:
        true if the events matched and the sticky event was removed.

      • removeAllStickyEvents

        public void removeAllStickyEvents()
        Removes all sticky events.

      • hasSubscriberForEvent

        public boolean hasSubscriberForEvent(Class<?> eventClass)

      • toString

        public String toString()
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 Object
